plot: Five rather frivolous musicians seize the opportunity to perform on a cruise in the Mediterranean. Alas: they are under contract to engage an female singer - and they fear to fall in love with her, which would endanger their friendship...
title: Wat doen we met de liefde?
plot_es: Five rather frivolous musicians seize the opportunity to perform on a cruise in the Mediterranean. Alas: they are under contract to engage an female singer - and they fear to fall in love with her, which would endanger their friendship...
